node.title: God's Principles of Freedom of Conscience - Part 4
node.description: This will be a series of studies concerning: 1) the history of religious freedom and liberty of conscience from the Protestant Reformation until the present time with emphasis on the conflict between tyranny and freedom within nations that were for those against liberty of conscience. Included will be the United States which has been the champion of liberties, but today there are those Americans, including Christians who are willing to give up personal freedoms for safety, 2) positive Muslim relationships with Christians and Jews during their Golden Age, 3) the relationship of the third angel’s message and liberty of conscience, and 4) freedom of conscience in religious liberty will be seen as foundational to all other freedoms.
